reasoning:
I'm in the PLANET_PACK phase after buying a Celestial Pack. I need to choose one of three planet cards:

1. Uranus (lvl.3): Level up Two Pair +1 Mult and +20 chips
2. Earth (lvl.1): Level up Full House +2 Mult and +25 chips  
3. Pluto (lvl.1): Level up High Card +1 Mult and +10 chips

Looking at my strategy:
- Two Pair is my main hand type (Level 3, played 7 times)
- I just bought Card Sharp which gives X3 Mult if I play the same hand twice in a round
- Two Pair is at Level 3: Base Chips 60, Base Mult 4

If I select Uranus:
- Two Pair would go to Level 4: Base Chips 80, Base Mult 5
- This directly buffs my most-played hand

If I select Earth:
- Full House would go to Level 2: Base Chips 65, Base Mult 6
- I've only played Full House once (just recently for 2,584 chips)
- This is not my primary strategy

If I select Pluto:
- High Card would go to Level 2: Base Chips 15, Base Mult 2
- I've never played High Card
- This is completely irrelevant to my strategy

The clear choice is Uranus. Two Pair is my core strategy, I've played it 7 times already, and with Card Sharp now in my lineup, buffing Two Pair becomes even more valuable since I can play it multiple times per round with the X3 multiplier.

Uranus will increase Two Pair from:
- Level 3: 60 chips, 4 mult
- To Level 4: 80 chips, 5 mult

This is a +20 chips and +1 mult boost to every Two Pair I play, which compounds with Card Sharp's X3 multiplier on the second play.


select 1
